title: Parental Ode to My Son, Aged Three Years and Five Months
description:
LibriVox volunteers bring you 16 recordings of A Parental Ode to My Son, Aged Three Years and Five Months by Thomas Hood.
This was the Fortnightly Poetry project for July 26, 2020.
-----
A father is trying to write a poem to his son, but the troublesome antics of the latter make the author put in interjections that entirely contradict the poetical picture he tries to paint of the child. ( MaybeCordelia)
